title: New & Video: Oupa – Physical
body: Not being a huge **Yuck** fan, I was at first apprehensive to check out **Oupa**, the side project of lead singer **Daniel Blumberg**. However, after overcoming any preconceived opinions, it didn’t take long for me to fall head over heels in love with his melancholic, thoughtful ballads; expressing a more mature, distinct sound to that of noise rock outfit **Yuck**. First release, the **_Weakend EP_** is a stunning collection of heart-wrenching serenades, personal highlight being the exquisitely elegant _Walk_. With a seven track cassette release around the corner, **Oupa** have made new song _Physical_ available for streaming, as well as providing a resplendently handsome video to accompany the track. Walk by Yu(c)k Documenting what appears to be a night-time drive through a burning forest, with the faint outline of a teenage girl overlay-ed on top of the harrowing images of destruction, providing a startling contrast. Coming in at almost seven minutes, _Physical_ is a courteous composition; restrained and purposefully delicate, relying heavily on the sublime vocals. Check out the video below and pre-order **_Forget_** from [Boiled Egg](http://boiledegg.bigcartel.com/). [Oupa – Physical](http://vimeo.com/27526503) from [Boiled Egg](http://vimeo.com/boiledegg) on [Vimeo](http://vimeo.com).
